entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Collins Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:21 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -31.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Collins Bay 02:00 AM CST Friday 24 February 2023
Temperature: -31.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -40
Dewpoint: -34.7°C
Wind: WSW 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 32. Wind chill near minus 44. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 41 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 35 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023
